name: Actua Soccer: Club Edition
overview: You can now play as your favourite Premier League team in your quest to lift the championship trophy. Choose your line-up from the latest squads and play through the entire season. With new live commentary from football's finest, Barry Davies, Actua Soccer Club Edition is as closeto real league action as you can get. Actua Soccer Club Edition is a re-edition of Actua Soccer, released with the 20 teams of the English Premiership instead of international competitions. New commentary was recorded and some Premiership historical data was included. All remaining aspects of the game were unchanged or just tweaked.
